_header: My lord when ye this book will over read
_description: Dedication Verses — two stanzas rhyme royal

BLRoy17Dvi.First Lines: My lord when ye thys boke wolle oure reddehast nowte to blyue yt wolle yow more auayll…
BLRoy17Dvi.Last Lines: …to say thie the trowege and ne turn [   ] hydeye go to do & prey god be y[      ] de
BLRoy17Dvi.Note: Added to front flyleaf by a hand of s. 16.
